verbose_text: The duration of the cell cycle in plants has been determined using various methods XREF_BIBR, such as labelling with 3 H-thymidine XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR or BrdU XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR, by blocking the cell cycle with colchicine XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR, and by kinematic methods with mathematical calculations XREF_BIBR.
